button_pin.componentleveltooltip: Left-click to pin unit for comparison on the Unit Information panel on the left-hand side of the screen.

max_units.componentleveltooltip: Number of units currently available for recruitment from this pool.||Unit pools will replenish based on the factors stated on each unit card's tooltip.

recruitmentcost.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to recruit this unit.

upkeepcost.componentleveltooltip: Upkeep||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} each turn while this unit exists.

unit_cap.componentleveltooltip: Unit capacity||This unit may only be recruited a number of times. Its capacity can be increased by constructing additional buildings.

eshin.name: eshin
eshin.tooltip: All units native to Clan Eshin do not have additional recruitment costs.

regular.name: regular
regular.tooltip: All units not native to Clan Eshin have additional recruitment costs. Depending on the unit, the cost can be decreased by improving your reputation with the four Greater Clans by completing contracts for them.

favour_point_holder.componentleveltooltip: Allegiance||This amount will be deducted from your [[img:icon_allegiance]][[/img]]Allegiance in order to recruit this unit.

max_units_long.componentleveltooltip: Number of units currently available for recruitment from this pool.||Unit pools will replenish based on the factors stated on each unit card's tooltip.
